name: WB Shows Quiz | Mixture: Networks | 10 Questions

questions.text: 'Buffy the Vampire Slayer'- In America, which network took over the show, after it left the WB at the conclusion of season five?
questions.explanation:
UPN.

	"Buffy" ended its reign on the WB after the season five finale "The Gift". It came back for seasons six and seven on the UPN network, while its spin-off "Angel" spent all five seasons on Fox. "Buffy" lived on as a season eight comic book series created by Joss Whedon. "Angel" did as well, in a season six comic called "After the Fall".

questions.text: In 'Charmed', who was in love with Cole, also known as the demon Belthazor?
questions.explanation:
Phoebe.

	Cole, played by Julian McMahon, was killed off in season five's "Centennial Charmed". He did return briefly, later on, to aid Piper in her search for Leo. Julian McMahon went on to star as Christian Troy in the highly controversial FX series, "Nip/Tuck".

questions.text: In '7th Heaven', what was Mary's deadbeat ex-boyfriend's last name?
On 'Charmed', what was the name of the cat they owned (called a familiar), who later proved to be human?
questions.explanation:
Kit.

	Kit ran away one day and the Halliwell sisters did not see her again until she returned as a human.

questions.text: On 'Grosse Pointe', on the 1st season, Hunter tells Courtney that she's been guest staring in what TV show when Courtney was still playing with puppets?
On 'Nikki', Nikki auditions for the part in what?
On 'Dawson's Creek', who did Joey choose at the end of the series?
questions.explanation:
Pacey.

	Pacey was played by Joshua Jackson. Joshua starred in a few films afterward before starring in the highly success Fox drama "Fringe" in 2008.

questions.text: On '7th Heaven', what is the last name of the main family?
What is the name of the town that Lorelai Gilmore lives in throughout the first five seasons of "Gilmore Girls"?
questions.explanation:
Stars Hollow.

	Lorelai and her buddy Sookie also opened their own inn in the same town.

questions.text: In 'Sabrina the Teenage Witch', how many people does Sabrina live with while in high-school?
